mapper.select: select g.*,pg.group_name as parent_name from user_group ug left join czp_group g on g.id=ug.group_id left join czp_group pg on pg.id=g.parent_id where ug.user_id=#{userId}
select u.* from czp_user u left join user_group ug on ug.user_id=u.id where ug.group_id=#{id} and ISNULL(ug.parent_id)
select g.*,pg.group_name as parent_name from czp_group g left join czp_group pg on pg.id=g.parent_id where g.id=#{id} or g.group_name like concat("%",#{id},"%")
select u.id from user_group ug left join czp_user u on u.id=ug.user_id where ug.group_id=#{id} and ISNULL(parent_id)
